div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://smart.who.int/ig/smart-immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D4 defines the following codes:

tr.td: Specific situations or medical conditions in which it is advised or recommended to avoid or delay administering a particular vaccine
The client is known to be severely immunocompromised or immunosuppressed

The client is known to have history of anaphylaxis in the past. Anaphylaxis is a severe and potentially life-threatening allergic reaction that can occur rapidly after exposure to an allergen or vaccine component.
The client is known to have severe allergic reaction to vaccine
The client is experiencing HIV-related symptoms

title.value: IMMZ.D4 CodeSystem for Check Contraindications Data Elements

description.value: CodeSystem for IMMZ.D4 Check Contraindications Data Elements
